summary: Hopesfire blade from Tribunal addon for TES3: Morrowind.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Hopesfire Resurrection[/color] Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Author[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures

[color=#ffff00]Requirements[/color]: Skyrim

This mod adds a Hopesfire sword from Tribunal addon for TES3: Morrowind. You can find a tips to obtain this weapon in a small camp southeast from Kynesgrove. This sword enchanted to cause Lightning damage and can be improved with an ebony ingot.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***
